plot: The hesitation of a couple in love about whether or not to make love leads to an unfortunate coincidence of events. So unfortunate that it inevitably leads to the death of one of them.
title: Talmen
plot_es: The hesitation of a couple in love about whether or not to make love leads to an unfortunate coincidence of events. So unfortunate that it inevitably leads to the death of one of them.
plot_en: The hesitation of a couple in love about whether or not to make love leads to an unfortunate coincidence of events. So unfortunate that it inevitably leads to the death of one of them.
